text: John Ortiz (born May 23, 1968) is an American actor. He is the co-founder of the LAByrinth Theater Company. He is known for his villain role as Arturo Braga in Fast & Furious (2009) and Fast & Furious 6 (2013).John Ortiz and Rosie Perez: Accidental Actors from the New York Times, date April 8, 2001 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Lab Theater: John Ortiz Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Brooklyn
title: John Ortiz
